data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Baotou, Nei Mongol, China need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Baotou, Nei Mongol, China

data.prayer: God, we pray for the believers in Baotou, Nei Mongol, China to be generous so that they would be worthy of greater investment by you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, grace the churches in Baotou, Nei Mongol, China with faithful local leaders.
data.verse: Where there is no guidance, a people falls, but in an abundance of counselors there is safety.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 109,005 believers in Baotou, Nei Mongol, China a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Bogol people.
Father, it’s possible most of the 1,304,682 lost people in  Baotou, Nei Mongol, China have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the county of Baotou be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the county of Baotou, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

location.name: Baotou
location.people_groups_list: Xibe, Buriat, Chinese, Mongol, Khamnigan, Olot, Mongol, Alxa
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Xibe (238,000), Buriat, Chinese (170,000), Mongol, Khamnigan (2,600), Olot (3,200), Mongol, Alxa (29,000)
